General.Name: Brave Bison Group PLC
General.Description: Brave Bison Group plc operates as a digital advertising agency in the United Kingdom, Europe, the Asia-Pacific, and internationally. The company provides digital advertising and technology services, include social media advertising, influencer marketing, paid media, search engine optimization, e-commerce software integration, system design, and others. It also owns and operates a network of social and digital media channel platforms such as YouTube, Snapchat, Facebook, TikTok, and Instagram; and popular channels include, The Hook, PGA Tour, US Open, and Link Up TV. The company engages in the creation, distribution, and monetization of video content through the social and digital media platforms, as well as advertise on behalf of customers. In addition, it plans and buys media across advertising platforms; and creates, improves, and manages transactional websites for customers. The company was formerly known as Rightster Group Plc and changed its name to Brave Bison Group Plc in May 2016. Brave Bison Group plc was founded in 2011 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: The Varnish Works, London, United Kingdom, N1 9AJ
